channel.title: How can I use podman rootlessly?
channel.description:
How can I use podman without root? I installed podman with sudo `apt install podman -y`
It works fine when I use sudo, like `sudo podman ps`, but when I try to run something with podman without root privileges like `podman ps` I get: `ERRO[0000] running `/usr/bin/newuidmap 3450 0 1000 1 1 100000 65536`: Error: cannot set up namespace using "/usr/bin/newuidmap": should have setuid or have filecaps setuid: fork/exec /usr/bin/newuidmap: permission denied zsh: exit 125 podman ps`
